review: I actually bought this to give as a gift for my Dad for Father's Day.  But I was curious about it, so I tried it out beforehand and liked it so much...I ended up keeping it!  The only gripes I would have about it is I didn't realize that you needed to have an outlet near the TV in order to plug in the stick in order for it to work.  Also, the remote is pretty small so it is easily lost.  Replacement remotes run $15 which is a little expensive in my opinion. They have an app for your phone or tablets, but it took up too much memory on my S5, so I had to delete it.  Also, I have to pay for a lot more movies and TV shows then I thought I would have to.  I already pay yearly for Prime, so they should really make more content available for Prime members...especially older movies.But all in all, it was a good buy and I would recommend it to other people who are already Prime members.
